## SEP variables for BHLL

A dataset with major recommended variables on socioeconomic position (SEP), so these can easily be included in your study. The dataset has been prepared by Morten and Cathrine June 2025.

Most recent version is:  [Short description and documentation of SEP-variables within BHLL](SEP%20on%20BHLL-population_ver6_14nov2025.docx). Now including reference to the newly published SEPLINE <https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/40641826/>.

Old versions: [Version 18jun2025](SEP%20on%20BHLL-population_ver5_18jun2025.docx).
